greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(3n) = 3n, otherwise a(n) = 1.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,2,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Table[If[Divisible[n,3],n,1],{n,0,100}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[ {0,0,2,0,0,-1},{0,1,1,3,1,1},100] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 18 2018 *)
program: (MAGMA) [n mod 3 eq 0 select n else 1: n in [0..92]];  // Bruno Berselli, Mar 11 2011
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Nov 09 2003
